title: MTECH USA Mt-665Bk Neck Knife 7.5-Inch Overall, black
description: One may find it difficult in finding other uses for a karambit knife other than combative method, but is a great piece of equipment for daily usage. The black Mtech MT-665BK is an improvement from its ancestors, which originated from the Indonesian archipelago. Designed with a finger ring at tip of textured handle for a secure grip and measures at 7.5". This karambit's stainless steel blade can function as a package opener, rope cutter, leatherwork tool, fishing tool, hunting tool and even construction tool for shaping carpets and drywalls. It also includes a black sheath with 2" belt loop attachment.
